data.name: Bloodpire
data.detailed_description:
* Screenshots are a work-in-progress and not reflective of the final product.

Bloodpire is a medieval fantasy roguelike top-down action game. The empire has been invaded by a group of vampires and other undead, they are capturing innocent civilians and using them as food.

Make your way from island to island, gathering materials and crafting new weapons and spells. You have the choice of being the hero of the empire and fighting the invasion or turning evil and bringing down the empire. You ethical choices change which enemies you will face and how people will react to your presence.

Find out the sinister story behind the invasion and unlock new clothing and other unlocks as you play!

data.short_description: Bloodpire is a medieval fantasy roguelike top-down action game. The empire has been invaded by a group of vampires and other undead, they are capturing innocent civilians and using them as food. Will you be the hero of the empire or will you make a different choice?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 680, AMD R9 280X
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 3.0 Ghz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 680, AMD R9 280X
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
